reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that Personal Information may be collected and used for specific purposes, and it describes different scenarios where data processing is allowed.
reply.reference: In order to make the Mobile Application and Services available to you, or to meet a legal obligation, we may need to collect and use certain Personal Information. If you do not provide the information that we request, we may not be able to provide you with the requested products or services. URL: https://mymind2.goodbarber.app/docs/privacy_policy.html

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects Personal Information such as demographic information (age and gender), device information (IP addresses), location information (city and state), and online behavioral data (social media website usage, page views, search results, and links).

content: Online behavioral data (social media website usage, page views, search results, links)

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the section of the privacy policy that mentions the collection of Personal Information from various sources including demographic, device, location, and online behavioral data.
reply.reference: Personal Information we collect from other sources may include demographic information, such as age and gender, device information, such as IP addresses, location, such as city and state, and online behavioral data, such as information about your use of social media websites, page view information and search results and links. URL: https://mymind2.goodbarber.app/docs/privacy_policy.html

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users have certain data protection rights, including the right to correct, amend, delete, or limit the use of their Personal Information. Users can also withdraw consent for processing their data and request the erasure of their Personal Information.
reply.reference: If you are a resident of the European Economic Area ('EEA'), you have certain data protection rights and we aim to take reasonable steps to allow you to correct, amend, delete, or limit the use of your Personal Information. If you wish to be informed what Personal Information we hold about you and if you want it to be removed from our systems, please contact us. URL: https://mymind2.goodbarber.app/docs/privacy_policy.html

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: No, the app does not share data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app does not share any information with unaffiliated third parties. It only shares information with Service Providers to perform services on its behalf or comply with legal requirements.
reply.reference: We will not share any personally identifiable information with third parties and will not share any information with unaffiliated third parties. Service Providers are not authorized to use or disclose your information except as necessary to perform services on our behalf or comply with legal requirements. URL: https://mymind2.goodbarber.app/docs/privacy_policy.html

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?
reply.analysis: The app shares data with Service Providers as mentioned in the privacy policy.
reply.reference: Service Providers are not authorized to use or disclose your information except as necessary to perform services on our behalf or comply with legal requirements. Service Providers are given the information they need only in order to perform their designated functions, and we do not authorize them to use or disclose any of the provided information for their own marketing or other purposes. We will not share any personally identifiable information with third parties and will not share any information with unaffiliated third parties. URL: https://mymind2.goodbarber.app/docs/privacy_policy.html
